title: Tool Misuse
description: Pattern derived from Who&When dataset analysis. Common failure: The agent hallucinates the video ID and calls the tool with placeholder data. The task is not attempted.
trigger_conditions: Agent receives task requiring specific tool usage
Task involves data processing or extraction
expected_error: The agent hallucinates the video ID and calls the tool with placeholder data. The task is not attemp
recovery_hint: Verify input data format and tool availability before proceeding

example_scenario.task: In the YouTube 360 VR video from March 2018 narrated by the voice actor of Lord of the Rings' Gollum, what number was mentioned by the narrator directly after dinosaurs were first shown in the video?
